name: running-tests-using-travis-and-saucelabs
description: An example of how to run TestCafe tests in the cloud using Travis CI and Sauce Labs.

scripts.test: while true; do free; sleep 1; done & node server.js & sleep 10; testcafe remote --qr-code tests/index-test.js; EXIT_CODE=$?; kill $!; exit $EXIT_CODE
